WI_JEF1.original: She's slowing down. Get ready to park up.
WI_JEF1.translated: 她正在减速，准备停车。

WI_JEF1.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to select the phone's main menu.
WI_JEF1.translated: 按下~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~来选择手机主菜单。

WI_JEF1.original: She's slowing down. Get ready to park up. Keep her in sight but don't get too close.
WI_JEF1.translated: 她正在减速，准备停车。确保她在视野内，注意保持距离。

WI_JEF1.original: ~s~Leave the Superstar Cafe.
WI_JEF1.translated: ~s~离开Superstar Cafe。

WI_JEF1.original: ~b~Jeff~s~ has been added to your phonebook contacts.
WI_JEF1.translated: ~b~Jeff~s~已经被添加至你的手机通讯录。

WI_JEF1.original: To take a picture with your phone you will need to access the phone's main menu. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~ to activate the phone.
WI_JEF1.translated: 从手机的主菜单中可以启动相机，按~INPUT_PHONE_TAKE_OUT~拿出手机。

WI_JEF1.original: Find the ~r~couple.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: 寻找那对~r~男女。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Follow ~r~Jeff's wife.
WI_JEF1.translated: 跟踪~r~Jeff的妻子。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff's wife and her friend are dead.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff的妻子和她的朋友死了。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Here they come.
WI_JEF1.translated: 他们来了。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff's wife realized she was being followed.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff的妻子意识到自己被跟踪了。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to move the camera. Zoom in and out using ~PAD_RSTICK_UPDOWN~. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image. When taking a photo of a person make sure you get a clear shot of their face.
WI_JEF1.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~移动相机，用~PAD_RSTICK_UPDOWN~进行缩放。按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~拍照。拍人时确保能拍到脸。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff's wife's friend is dead.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff妻子的朋友死了~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Keep your distance. You're too close.
WI_JEF1.translated: 保持距离，你靠得太近了。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~The couple realized they were being followed.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~这对男女发现自己被跟踪了。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Follow ~r~Jeff's wife~s~ but don't get too close.
WI_JEF1.translated: 跟踪~r~Jeff的妻子，~s~但不要靠得太近。

WI_JEF1.original: Stay out of sight. Don't let them get suspicious.
WI_JEF1.translated: 待在他们的视线外，别让他们起疑。

WI_JEF1.original: Once the picture has been sent, wait a short moment for a reply.
WI_JEF1.translated: 发送照片后等待回复。

WI_JEF1.original: Enter the Superstar Cafe and find the ~r~couple.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: 进入Superstar Cafe寻找那对~r~男女。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff's wife didn't get caught.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff的老婆没有被抓到现行。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Obtain a clear shot of both faces.
WI_JEF1.translated: 把两人的脸都清楚拍下。

WI_JEF1.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to send the picture to a contact.
WI_JEF1.translated: 按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~将照片发给联系人。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff is dead.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff死了~s~

WI_JEF1.original: You have been spotted.
WI_JEF1.translated: 你被发现了。

WI_JEF1.original: From the menu scroll down and select ~h~Camera.~s~ Activate the camera by pressing ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~.
WI_JEF1.translated: 在菜单中下移选中~h~相机。~s~按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~启动相机。

WI_JEF1.original: Take a picture of the ~r~couple.
WI_JEF1.translated: 拍下那对~r~男女。

WI_JEF1.original: Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image on screen.
WI_JEF1.translated: 按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~拍照。

WI_JEF1.original: ~r~Jeff's wife is dead.~s~
WI_JEF1.translated: ~r~Jeff的妻子死了。~s~

WI_JEF1.original: Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to move the camera. Zoom in and out using ~PAD_LSTICK_UPDOWN~. Press ~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~ to capture an image. When taking a photo of a person make sure you get a clear shot of their face.
WI_JEF1.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~移动相机，用~PAD_RSTICK_UPDOWN~进行缩放。按~INPUT_PHONE_ACCEPT~拍照。拍人时确保能拍到脸。

WI_JEF1.original: They are going inside the cafe, wait until they reach the bar and take a photo of the ~r~couple.~s~ Don't get too close.
WI_JEF1.translated: 他们要进入咖啡厅了，等他们到达吧台后并拍下那对~r~男女。~s~别靠太近。
